title: Oscar Rivadeneira
text:
Oscar Rivadeneira (born in 1960 in <a href="Lima">Lima</a>, Peru) is a retired <a href="Peruvian">Peruvian</a> <a href="Boxing">boxer</a>.
Rivadeneira fought with <a href="Michael%20Spinks">Michael Spinks</a> in 1983 for the <a href="Light%20Heavyweight">Light Heavyweight</a> championship. He was beaten in a tenth round <a href="knockout">knockout</a>.
